author: Elaine Glusac
title: Resort and Tour News: Winter Trips in Yellowstone; Beer History in London
text:
Our morning travel news digest, with deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
IN COZUMEL, NEW ROUTES FOR ADVANCED DIVERS
In its fourth iteration, the Cozumel Scuba Fest in Cozumel, Mexico, has added new dive routes for experts. The annual event, coming Dec. 8 to 13, welcomes all levels, including beginners, with scheduled dives and now has special appeal for advanced scuba divers in nine dives that require Advanced Open Water Diver Certification. The new expert dives explore the sunken ship Xicotencatl at 82 feet, as well as reefs north of the island and cenotes on it. In addition, the festival will expand for the first time this year beyond Cozumel to explore other dive routes in the Yucat√°n, especially its underground rivers and cenotes, also for experts only.
NEW WINTER TOURS IN YELLOWSTONE
